description: Default service descriptions for pet grooming tenants (informational only, no pricing)

services.title: Bath & Brush
services.shortDescription: Basic grooming service for clean, fresh pets
services.description: Our bath and brush service includes a thorough bath with premium shampoo, blow dry, brush out, nail trim, ear cleaning, and finishing cologne. Perfect for maintaining your pet's coat between full grooming appointments.
benefits: Thorough brush out and blow dry

services.title: Full Grooming Service
services.shortDescription: Complete grooming with haircut and styling
services.description: Our comprehensive grooming service includes everything in our bath package plus professional haircut and styling. We follow breed standards or customize the style to your preferences.
benefits: Nail trim and paw pad trim

services.title: Spa Package
services.shortDescription: Luxury pampering experience for your pet
services.description: Treat your pet to our ultimate spa experience! This premium service includes all grooming services plus special treatments like deep conditioning, facial, teeth cleaning, and nail polish.

services.title: Puppy's First Groom
services.description: Special grooming experience designed for puppies having their first professional grooming. We take extra time and care to make it a positive, stress-free experience.

services.title: De-Shedding Treatment
services.shortDescription: Reduce shedding and maintain healthy coat
services.description: Specialized treatment for heavy shedding breeds. Our de-shedding service removes loose undercoat, reduces shedding, and promotes healthy skin and coat.

services.title: Cat Grooming
services.description: Specialized grooming services for cats, with extra patience and care. We understand feline behavior and work gently to keep your cat comfortable and stress-free.
